level.text: The purpose of this chapter is to establish the procedure for the request and authorization of official travel and the reimbursement of official business expenses, pursuant to Reorganization Plan No. 5 of 1983 and Mayor’s Order 84-52.
The provisions of this chapter shall apply to all employees of the District of Columbia Government.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is section 448 of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act of 1973, as amended, Pub. L. No. 93-198, 87 Stat. 801 (codified at D.C. Code § 47-310, as amended, (1997 Repl. And 1999 Supp.)) and Reorganization Plan No. 5 of 1983, effective March 1, 1984.
